name: Pendulum
0:
”Alexa, ask Pendulum Clock to tell me the time”
”Alexa, start Pendulum Clock”
”Alexa, launch Pendulum Clock”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pendulum clock
des:
Skill purpose is to tell the current time to the user.

How it works: Ask "Alexa, ask pendulum clock what is the current time?" or "Alexa, tell me the current time from pendulum clock?" and Alexa will tell you the current time.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
